short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install the Gmail Exporter Chrome extension and experience the ease of one-click email export.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gmail List Maker is a free chrome extension that helps you export your gmail contacts easily with just one click.

Our Chrome extension automates the export process, saving you precious time and energy. Forget tedious copying and pasting now it's easy.

You can try to export your contacts however most of the emails you receive that are also contacts and are not stored, there are no easy way to export them, there's where Gmail List Maker bright.

Anywhere in your Gmail
Right-click anywhere in your Gmail inbox and look for the 'Export Gmail Emails' option in the context menu. Choose between CSV or JSON format to export your emails

Click, Export, Done! Gmail List Maker is your new must have tool in your chrome extension toolbar.
